flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to buy a $60 game and $5 of candy so 60 + 5 = $<<60+5=61>>61
He will make $8 per hour of babysitting and will work 9 hours so 8 * 9 = $<<8*9=72>>72
He made $72 and spent $61 so 72-61 = $<<72-61=11>>11 left over

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 65, not 61. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
